ADC_UI Body

Implementation of the GUI logic of the ADC APEX application

Author

Juergen Sieben, ConDeS GmbH

Private package ariables
State variables
g_page_values

PL/SQL table to hold key value pairs for page items (key) and their values

copy_row_to_cap_records
procedure copy_row_to_cap_records(
p_row in adc_ui_edit_cat%rowtype,

p_rec_2 out nocopy adc_action_parameters_v%rowtype,
p_rec_3 out nocopy adc_action_parameters_v%rowtype
)

Helper method to cast the complex view ADC_UI_EDIT_CAT to three record instances of type adc_action_parameters_v%ROWTYPE

Parameters
p_row
in adc_ui_edit_cat%rowtype

Record with the pivoted param_1 .. param_3 values

p_rec

Output record

initialize
procedure initialize

Method to initialize the ADC_UI package

Initially collects the name of all ADC Desginer page items per form region and persists them in an internal data structure for convenient access when working with the page designer.
